summary: Adds skill increases to the books added by Cliffworms\'s mod Tamriel Compendium (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10462)
descriptionHtml:
Please Endorse if you like it

Adds skill increases to the books added by Cliffworms\'s mod Tamriel Compendium (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10462). Not all skill increases could be added because they do not exist in Skyrim. I didnt bother trying to add Spear, Athletics, Acrobatics and Hand-to-hand skill ups from previous games because I could not relate them with any existing skill. Old skill ups like Mysticism, axe, blunt, short blade, medium armor, armorer and long blade have been added to either alteration, one-handed, light armor, smithing or two-handed. 

Update: 1 more skill book added that was missed.
author: Necis
